summary: A test suite that validates the include mechanism of a quantum circuit library, checking that external gate definitions can be loaded, version information is respected, source directory search order is applied correctly, nested includes function as expected, and standard library (qelib1) handling conforms to specifications.
business_intent: Ensure reliable inclusion of external resources and standard libraries in quantum circuit definitions, preventing errors in gate loading, version mismatches, and directory resolution for production-quality software.
